title: Completed PE Summary - Roseanne/ Sven Dede
raw_html:
Vessel name Roseanne
Category Fishing
Registered Owner & Manager: Mr P Casey
Port of registry: North Shields
Flag: UK
Type: Fishing vessel
Construction: Hull
Length overall: 9.98
Gross tonnage: 9.94
Date & Time 07/01/04 14:55
Location of incident: Tyne Harbour area
Incident Type: Hazardous Incident
Damage/ Pollution: None

Vessel name Sven Dede
Category Merchant
Registered Owner & Manager: Friedhelm Dede KG
Port of registry: Hamburg
Flag: Antigua & Barbuda
Type: Dry cargo
Built: 1991
Length overall: 103.5
Gross tonnage: 3815.00
Date & Time 07/01/04 14:55

Synopsis

Near miss between FV Roseanne and Sven Dede 1.5 miles east of the port of Tyne.

Action taken:

No recommendations were made as a consequence of this accident - however, an article highlighting the safety lessons to be learned from this accident will be included in a forthcoming Safety Digest.
